targets.rawSql: SELECT minute AS time, SUM(items_out) AS value FROM v_node_throughput_24h GROUP BY minute ORDER BY minute
SELECT node, calls, ROUND(avg_ms,1) AS avg_ms, ROUND(p50_ms,1) AS p50_ms, ROUND(p95_ms,1) AS p95_ms FROM v_node_latency_7d ORDER BY node
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(error_count),0) AS value FROM v_recent_errors_7d
